original_title: オフィスレディの湿ったパンスト 岡田ひなの
overview: Three years after joining the company, Ayano was assigned to the sales department, which was her wish. Ayano, who was enthusiastic about her work and thoughtful, was also loved by her seniors, and she got off to a good start. Soon after, she accompanies her senior, Sugiura, on her business trips as a follower. After successfully completing the business negotiations with her, Sugiura visits Ayano's room with her after-party sake.
title: Office Lady’s Wet Pantyhose Hinano Okada
